body_text: What was the first manga in color? I know that there are mangas printed in color as opposed to black and white. One example of this is Colorful by Torajirō Kishi, which is the only one that I know of. What was the first manga that was printed entirely in color--as opposed to just cover pages on tankoban being in color?
Why are manga black and white? This question triggered my curiosity for this question. Why most of manga are black and white? Is this because of more cost if they add colors to it?
